com.siperian.bdd.userexits.utils

Interface BDDMessagesLocalizationGate


  • public interface BDDMessagesLocalizationGate
    Provides a gate to the BDD localization mechanism. BDD holds all messages in resource bundles and processes them depending on the locale. Resource bundles are stored as part of the BDD application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OperationExecutionErrorType getErrorTypeFromMessageCode(String code, String[] localizationArguments)
      Returns a OperationExecutionErrorType that corresponds to a message with the specified code
      String getLocalizedErrorMessage(String code, String[] localizationArguments)
      Localize a BDD error message from BDD error message bundle.
      String getLocalizedMessage(String code, String[] localizationArguments)
      Localize a BDD message from standard BDD message bundle.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalizedMessage

        String getLocalizedMessage(String code,
                           String[] localizationArguments)
        Localize a BDD message from standard BDD message bundle.
        Parameters:
        code - - message code
        localizationArguments - - localization argument
        Returns:
        Returns localized message in accordance with current BDD locale and JMM
